name: Apple Pencil Pro
image_prompt: Apple Pencil Pro, white cylindrical design, matte finish, minimal Apple logo
description: Most advanced Apple Pencil with squeeze gesture, barrel roll detection, and haptic feedback. Features Find My support, magnetic attachment, and wireless charging. Perfect for creative pros.

reviews.review_text: Squeeze gesture is intuitive. Tool switching is instant.
Barrel roll for brush angle is a game changer.
Great pencil but expensive for an accessory.
